name: Tumbler's Toy
description: An antique plaything found in the ruins of an Ozenja circus bazaar.

abilities.name: Vault
abilities.description: Propels the caster a short distance forward.
notes: Interrupts the caster's channeling abilities upon cast
Always leaps towards the direction the user is facing. Locks the user's facing angle during the leap
Can leap over other units and over impassable terrain
During Leap, the user can attack, use items and cast abilities, except recasting Vault
However, they cannot turn, so targeted abilities and items may only be used in the direction they are facing
Getting rooted while already leaping does not cancel the leap
Taking more than 0 damage from any other player (after reductions and not flagged as HP Removal) puts the item on a cooldown

additionalInfo: Acquired by crafting with Madstone. See the Madstone article for crafting mechanics
When crafted with the Dormant Curio, the leap distance is increased by 30%
